attributes.action: Force the police to actively enforce the ban on fox hunting
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The ban on fox hunting is not being enforced by the police. there are many people in this country that are against fox hunting and blood sports, so why are the police not being proactive and stopping these rougue hunts that are flouting the law

Force the police to do their duty...stop the hunts!
